# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react-native-restart`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for react-native-restart (https://github.com/avishayil/react-native-restart#readme).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/react-native-restart

 * Global values: none
